description:
Scott Powell is a dynamic trial lawyer and negotiator who has helped hundreds of clients achieve legal victory. Scott's practice focuses on cases involving serious personal injury and/or wrongful death.

In addition, our firm represents the victims of medical malpractice and nursing home negligence. This includes cases involving misdiagnosis, surgical mistakes, prescription errors, bed sores, and other types of medical negligence.

Founding attorney Scott Emerson Powell enjoys a unique vantage point of having spent the first part of his career defending personal injury and medical malpractice cases. As a former civil defense attorney, Mr. Powell now uses his intimate knowledge of the insurance and healthcare industries to build stronger cases on behalf of his clients.

And the results speak for themselves! Mr. Powell has been named as a Kentucky Super Lawyers Rising Star every year since 2013. He was recognized as a Top 100 Trial Lawyer by the National Trial Lawyers Association in 2015. Mr. Powell and his firm have also been featured in numerous acclaimed publications, including: Forbes, Businessweek, Attorney at Law Magazine, and more.

Our firm understands that when people are injured, they may have difficulties returning to work and engaging in everyday activities. We take every step possible to minimize the impact of injury on our clients' lives. We offer free initial consultations to clients throughout Kentucky and Southern Indiana.
